attributes.action: Abolish the Dickensian practice of home repossession by making it encumbent on mortgage lenders to purchase their own insurance against default due to genuine hardship in the repayment of any mortgage that they grant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be encumbent on the lender to pay for this insurance because a bank intending to foreclose could stop payment of a borrower's mortgage protection premium before taking further steps.
